content: CP 680-P/M water barrier module Pre-installed water barrier that meets W-rating requirements for a wide range of penetrants ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection- ### FEATURES:Features Quick and simple installation – just screw the water barrier module on top of your firestop cast-in device and you are done No extra work required to achieve W-rating Available for all your applications – 2, 3, 4 and 6 Applications For use with CP 680-P/M or CFS-DID For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: W-rating: Yes Technical Data | W-rating | Yes ### ITEMS- 244260 - Sealing cap CP 680-P/M 2 WR - Package Size 10 pc - 244261 - Sealing cap CP 680-P/M 3 WR - Package Size 10 pc - 244262 - Sealing cap CP 680-P/M 4 WR - Package Size 5 pc - 244263 - Sealing cap CP 680-P/M 6 WR - Package Size 1 pc
